title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-1.15 - Future climate risk
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 613-1.15 - Future climate risk

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements set forth in this Part, facilities must take into account the provisions of ECL section 17-1015 to
comply with the provisions of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
613-1.15

Adopted

New

York State Register July 19, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 29, eff. 10/17/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
